meteorExtinctionHome.text1: The first game by Lastand Development is now in development!
meteorExtinctionHome.description: The goal of the game is to prevent meteors from hitting the earth using a shield and rockets. There's a freeplay mode where you can try to beat your or your friend's highscore and a level mode where upgrades can be purchased to help you master increasingly difficult levels.

woodenGUIHome.text1: Wooden GUI is a resource pack for Minecraft: Java Edition.
woodenGUIHome.description: It brings a cozy wood look to all of Minecraft's user interface. It is vibrant and optimized for optimal item visibility. Furthermore, Wooden GUI fits perfectly with the vanilla textures of Minecraft, as it is based on them.
woodenGUIHome.betaWarning: It is still a beta version. Especially in the later survival game, some menus that have not yet been edited can be found. Therefore, the resource pack will be updated regularly.

changelogAlpha01.p1: Basic Gameplay: Shield to defend the Earth, Meteors falling, Rockets available after 10 points
changelogAlpha01.p2: Main Menu to start the Game

changelogAlpha011.p1: Added ability to pause the game (ESC key)
changelogAlpha011.p2: Added ability to stop or restart the game
changelogAlpha011.p4: Added display of the text "New Highscore" when the highscore is broken
changelogAlpha011.p5: Bugs with the way buttons and scores have been displayed on different aspect ratios have been fixed

changelogAlpha012.p1: Crosshair is built in as a native mouse pointer, so it's more direct, no longer lags behind, and can be displayed over the score
changelogAlpha012.p2: Fixed a bug that sometimes prevented the remaining attempts from being displayed correctly after restarting the game in the pause menu
changelogAlpha012.p3: Fixed a bug that occurred when app info was opened and then closed again very quickly
changelogAlpha012.p4: Fixed a bug that prevented the correct crosshair from being displayed during the countdown if the game ended while being paused
